HomeWiki:
wpf4gp

Common utilities for wpf

This project contains few useful class for work with WPF and the MVVM pattern.
You can find:
  1. A DelegateCommand class for implement an ICommand in the View Model
  2. A DialogCloser dependency property for close a window from the View Model
  3. A TreeViewHelper for bind the selected item of a tree view to a View Model property
  4. Some converters for editing (Bool-Visible, Bool-Hidden, Decimal-String, Integer-String)
  5. An ExceptionMessageBox for show the message of an Exception with a special button for look at the details of the Exception
